## getDefaultRelativeTimeRange() function

### getDefaultRelativeTimeRange() function

Returns the default realtive time range.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function getDefaultRelativeTimeRange(): RelativeTimeRange;
```

<b>Import</b>
